title: The Favorites - NFL Week 5 Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 5 Gambling Preview
description:
After a profitable Week 5 thanks to a thrilling New York Jets and New York Giants moneyline parlay, the Action Network's Chad Millman is joined once again by professional sports bettor Simon Hunter to preview this week's NFL slate. Together they go through every game on the board, and provide their favorite bets thus far. We get a "Simon Says" game of the week, plus the duo jumps into a foxhole together over the Miami Dolphins.

LAR SEA (11 MIN)

NYJ ATL (15 MIN)

NE HOU (17 MIN)

MIA TB (19 MIN)

PHL CAR (22 MIN)

DET MIN (26 MIN)

TEN JAX (30 MIN)

DEN PIT (34 MIN)

GB CIN (36 MIN)

NO WFT (39 MIN)

CHI LV (40 MIN)

CLE LAC (43 MIN)

NYG DAL (47 MIN)

SF AZ (49 MIN)

BUF KC (50 MIN)

IND BALT (54 MIN)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
